channel.title: The Secret Meeting
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gEffwar_7_Q
We did this video for a project in our video class.
Basically we just had to make a movie that had a secret meeting, the character Jimmy Cogswell, a briefcase, and the line "What's going on?"
The original concept, editing, color correction, the camera shots, and motion graphics all done by me. Dialogue (what a weird word) was mostly improv. Kevon and Kristen filmed and recorded audio cause I was in every shot.
Yes it's pretty cheesy. Yes it's probably lame. But we had fun, so.

item.title: The Secret Meeting
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:6, topic:278125”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=367105.msg2784642#msg2784642 date=1242419606]
I was thinking more of, whats with the song at the beginning? There was no need for the screamo at that point, ok a song might have been good but screamo was not a good choice.
[/quote]I actually like screamo. Great choice of a song, too

This wasn’t your video and it wasn’t your choice of song though.[/quote]
[center] Why is it 90% of your posts contain pure quotes of others or additions of 1-5 words? [/center]

item.title: The Secret Meeting
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

First song is Lord Xenu, last song on The Devil Wears Prada’s newest epic: With Roots Above And Branches Below.

Then Never Again - All Shall Perish, and 10 Signs You Should Leave - Emmure respectively.
